title: How to Save Your Progess in Pokemon Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum

steps.title: Go to the menu by pressing the Start button.
steps.content: Go to the menu by pressing the Start button. If you have the setting on where you can pop up the Start button using X, you can use X as well.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "Save" option and press A.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "Save" option and press A.

steps.title: Press "Yes" on every question the system asks you, and don't turn the power off until it is done saving.
steps.content: Press "Yes" on every question the system asks you, and don't turn the power off until it is done saving. Turning off the power while saving might corrupt your save file or not save at all.
